page.title: 04DANCE FESTIVAL
page.content:
since there is no public pool here.
DANCE FESTVAL
Each year there is a First Schools Dance Festival held at Riveriew School. About 300 children from 16 schools take part in this open air display. The event is organised by the school with help from East Surrey Song and Folk Dance Society, who supply the music and the caller on the day. The dances to be performed are agreed upon about 6 months before. These are usually traditional folk dances of the British Isles, with some American influences.
